subtitleNullable: Dataset for detecting masks on faces.
descriptionNullable:
Handcrafted dataset which contains a total of 11.8k (11,751) images are categorized into train, validation and test splits.
Format: 'png', 'jpg', 'jpeg'
Resolution: 'rgb', 'rgba'
The image size ranges from height:25-1041, width:25-1600 pixels. All augmented images are rescaled to have 256*256 pixels.

## Sources - 
-Kaggle datasets
-RMFD dataset (https://github.com/X-zhangyang/Real-World-Masked-Face-Dataset)
-Self created images

## Files - 
Train - It contains 8118 images, divided into Withmask: 4086 images and Withoutmask: 4032 images.
Val - It contains 1824 images, divided into Withmask: 922 images and Withoutmask: 902 images.
Test - It contains 1809 images, divided into Withmask: 849 images and Withoutmask: 960 images.
title: Face-mask detection
